text: "Bombscare" is a track from the 1991 album Hold It Down by 2 Bad Mice. It makes heavy use of samples, taking drumbeats then chopping and rearranging them to create a distinctive musical style. The main sample heard is from the song Don't Mess With This Beat by Neon; other samples for the breakbeat are from Let Me Love You (Rebuilt) by Kariya. A single was released in the UK in 1996 featuring several remixes of the song. It peaked at No. 46 on the UK Singles Chart.Polyhex.com ==References== ==External links== * Hold It Down (Discogs.com) Category:1991 singles Category:1991 songs
title: Bombscare
